column2: SES - Page Offer Extension - Get Offer Email
This is the email that sent to the member when a member click on get offer link.

[header]

Congratulations, you have received a copun code [couponcode]. Click on the link below to visit the Offer:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
When I like a page offer
When I create a page offer.
When someone like my page offer.
When a user (subject) likes another user’s page offer (object).
When a user (subject) create a page offer (object).
When I mark a page offer as favourite.
When someone mark my page offer as favourite.
When a user (subject) mark page offer (object) as favourite.
When I mark a page offer as follow.
When someone follow my page offer.
When a user (subject) followed another user’s page offer (object).
